description.value:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Order Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Order Domain Spells
Cleric LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCommand000]{Command}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHeroism000]{Heroism}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHoldPerson]{Hold Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplZoneOfTrut]{Zone of Truth}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMassHealin]{Mass Healing Word}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSlow000000]{Slow}
7th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCharmMonst]{Charm Monster}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCompulsion]{Compulsion}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster}
